Articles.Content:
You can't be "somewhere else..." if you're right here, cheater!

Don't pretend to be in all places at once besides here, its cheating!
Asking me to bump this thread up on Skype because it died!? HARDCORE CHEATER! XD
"XD?" I believe that qualifies you as a cheater.
Being a mad rocket scientist? You seem to be a cheating enthusiast. Good rocket scientists don't get mad, they get calculating.

Calculation is cheating. Real pilots eyeball it.

"That tank will get me to Duna. It's stripey!"
Pfft. Eyeballing it? real players don't even need eyes, you cheater!
Quote in sig? I believe that qualifies you as a cheater.
Only U.S. Rockets? Cheater!
Online? I believe that qualifies you as a cheater.

V2 W/Transport? Sacrilege! Everyone knows the only thing you should ever need is MOAR BOOSTERS.

Wheels, for Jeb's sake?! Cheater!

Moar boosters?

WHAT A CHEATER!

Double ees? You can't possibly have two res in your name, that's not allowed.

You are a cheater

Next door? I don't see you next door.

cheater

How does the rocket in your avatar lift off?? :-S

Obvious cheater is obvious.

Avatar that looks dormant?

CHEATER!11weqqe23q
You love the -909? CHEATER! Real players make do with a Swivel and duct tape!
Liking rockets more than trains? Cheater!

Numbers in your username? I believe that qualifies you as a cheater.

Wow, I'm surprised that no one has noticed that I'm using almost the same message every time.
Spaces in a username are clearly cheating. Only the foulest of cheaters wou-...waitaminute.
Using your password as your username? Pretty sure that makes you a cheater.
More rep and posts than me, but joined only a few months ago?! Cheater!
More rep and posts than me, but joined after me? Cheats!
